items:
*It's for Everyone*
Some people love heat. Others crave flavor. Then there are those who want both. Happy Boy is an original hot sauce recipe that enhances all kinds of foods.

*It's Perfect for Every Meal*
Breakfast, lunch, and dinner — you'll always find another way to use Happy Boy. Unleash your creative side and start making all your meals more exciting!

*You'll Want It Every Day*
This pepper sauce hits different. Happy Boy's _real_ ingredients deliver a crave-worthy flavor that's equal parts spicy, savory, zesty, and sweet!
